results.description: Surrey sign former South Africa batsman Hashim Amla on a two-year Kolpak contract.
results.shortTitle: Surrey sign ex-South Africa batsman Amla
results.title: Hashim Amla: Surrey sign ex-South Africa batsman on Kolpak deal

results.description: South Africa director of rugby Rassie Erasmus praises 'legend' Gatland
results.shortTitle: Warren Gatland 'a legend of the game'
results.title: Warren Gatland 'an absolute legend of the game'

thumbnail.altText: Rassie Erasmus, South Africa's director of rugby

results.description: India take the final two South Africa wickets in consecutive balls to wrap up a dominant win by an innings and 202 runs and secure a 3-0 series whitewash.
results.shortTitle: India wrap up series whitewash over SA
results.title: India v South Africa: Hosts wrap up series whitewash with dominant third Test win

results.description: South Africa batsman Dean Elgar withdraws from the third Test against India after being hit on the helmet by a short-pitched delivery.
results.shortTitle: Proteas' Elgar withdraws after head blow
results.title: India v South Africa: Dean Elgar withdraws from third Test after head injury

about.label: Concussion and head trauma in sport
about.preferredLabel: Concussion and head trauma in sport

results.description: India thrash South Africa by an innings and 137 runs in the second Test in Pune to secure a record 11th home Test series win in a row.
results.shortTitle: India thrash SA to claim Test record
results.title: India v South Africa: Hosts secure record 11th straight home Test series win

thumbnail.altText: India captain Virat Kohli celebrates against South Africa

results.description: India dismiss South Africa for 275 for a lead of 326 after three days of the second Test in Pune.
results.shortTitle: India in command after Ashwin haul
results.title: India v South Africa: Ravichandran Ashwin haul maintains hosts' dominance

results.description: Mayank Agarwal makes a century for the second match in succession as India post 273-3 on day one of the second Test with South Africa.
results.shortTitle: Agarwal hits second century for India
results.title: India v South Africa: Mayank Agarwal hits another century

results.description: Glamorgan's former South Africa fast bowler Marchant de Lange signs a new two-year contract at the club.
results.shortTitle: Glamorgan's De Lange signs new contract
results.title: Marchant de Lange: Glamorgan hand new deal to ex-South Africa paceman

results.description: India dominate South Africa to win the first Test of their three-match home series by 203 runs in Visakhapatnam.
results.shortTitle: Dominant India beat SA in first Test
results.title: India v South Africa: Mohammed Shami takes 5-35 as dominant hosts win

results.description: India's Rohit Sharma becomes the first batsman to score two hundreds in his first Test as opener and breaks the record for the most sixes in a Test.
results.shortTitle: India opener Rohit breaks sixes record
results.title: India v South Africa: Rohit Sharma breaks record for most sixes in a Test

thumbnail.altText: India batsman Rohit Sharma plays a shot

results.description: Afghanistan appoint former South Africa all-rounder Lance Klusener as the team's new head coach after Phil Simmons' summer departure.
results.title: Afghanistan appoint former South Africa all-rounder Lance Klusener as head coach

results.description: Results, reports and scorecards from South Africa's tour of India, featuring three Tests and three Twenty20 internationals.
results.title: South Africa in India 2019

results.description: South Africa captain Faf du Plessis joins Kent as the county bid to reach the T20 Blast knockout stages.

results.title: Faf du Plessis: South Africa captain joins Kent for T20 Blast run-in

results.description: South Africa left-arm spinner Tabraiz Shamsi joins Hampshire for the remainder of the T20 Blast group stage.

results.title: T20 Blast: South Africa spinner Tabraiz Shamsi joins Hampshire for rest of group stage

results.description: South Africa batsman and former captain Hashim Amla retires from international cricket at the age of 36.
results.title: Hashim Amla: South Africa batsman retires from international cricket

results.description: Gary Kirsten is appointed coach of Durban Heat, ruling him out of becoming England's next coach.
results.shortTitle: Kirsten takes T20 job in South Africa
results.title: Gary Kirsten appointed Durban Heat coach

results.description: South Africa's leading Test wicket-taker Dale Steyn announces his Test retirement but will play one-day and T20 internationals.

results.description: Ottis Gibson, who has been linked with replacing Trevor Bayliss as England coach, is released from his role with South Africa.

results.title: South Africa: Ottis Gibson let go from head coach role after World Cup

results.description: From Rihanna's cameo to Carlos Brathwaite's near heroics and Ben Stokes' acrobatics, we look at the highlights and lowlights of the World Cup group stage.
